Package steps

Class HomeSteps

java.lang.Object
steps.HomeSteps
public class HomeSteps extends Object
HomeSteps class contains step definitions for the home page of the application. It includes methods to interact with elements on the home page and verify their behavior. These are used in Cucumber tests.
